summary: Retired British spy Harry Palmer (Sir Michael Caine) is called back into service by his government to help prevent North Korea from getting its hands on a deadly virus called "The Red Death".
cast: Anatoly Kulbitsky|Shaughan Seymour|Michael Caine|Corinna Richards|Tamara Timofeeva|Jason Connery|Anatoliy Shvederskiy|Helena Michell|Juliette Benson|Patrick Allen|Sue Lloyd|Annika Bullus|Chris Tulloch|Mia Sara|Michael Gambon|Tatjana Berkova|Ingolf Gorges|Anatoli Davydov|John Dunn-Hill|Aleksandr Bajkov|Gregory Hlady|Michael Sarrazin|Lev Prygunov|Aleksandr Zavyalov|Anatoly Suvnikov|Svetlana Nemirovskaya|Sergey Russkin|Anastasiya Belova|Mikhail Alikin|Aleksandr Ilin|Ivan Shvedoff|Igor Khvan|Burt Kwouk
